newsitem.title: INDIA: India's Mafatlal in insurance software tie-up.
newsitem.headline: India's Mafatlal in insurance software tie-up.

text.p: India's Mafatlal Consultancy Services (I) Ltd, a leading software solutions and consultancy firm, has tied-up with Norwegian firm Continuum SICS to market insurance software in India, the Indian firm said.
Mafatlal Consultancy Services, a member of the Arvind Mafatlal group, said it will represent Continuum locally and market their insurance reinsurance software product.
It said in a statement that Continuum is the world's leading supplier of software and consultancy services for the reinsurance and insurance industry.
India's insurance sector is dominated by state firms but is likely to be opened to the private sector under the country's economic reforms programme.
